detectors.description:
GreenXToken.transferOwnership(address) (../../../Desktop/mainnet/00/004dcfc79b28ae0d52c2c013a328f84b433a1829_GreenXToken.sol#66-68) should emit an event for: 
	- owner = newOwner (../../../Desktop/mainnet/00/004dcfc79b28ae0d52c2c013a328f84b433a1829_GreenXToken.sol#67)

GreenXToken.transferOwnership(address).newOwner (../../../Desktop/mainnet/00/004dcfc79b28ae0d52c2c013a328f84b433a1829_GreenXToken.sol#66) lacks a zero-check on :
		- owner = newOwner (../../../Desktop/mainnet/00/004dcfc79b28ae0d52c2c013a328f84b433a1829_GreenXToken.sol#67)
solc-0.4.20 is not recommended for deployment
